nodes.text: The Cularin New Comer Center was a building that was located in the city Hedrett on the planet Cularin, during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. The center provided support to individuals who had recently arrived in the Cularin system, providing information on how to navigate around the system, where to find local services, and help on gaining employment. The Metatheran Cartel made a number of donations to the center's program.
